org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata

类 HsqlTableMetaDataProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata.GenericTableMetaDataProvider
      • org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata.HsqlTableMetaDataProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    TableMetaDataProvider

    public class HsqlTableMetaDataProvider
extends GenericTableMetaDataProvider
    The HSQL specific implementation of TableMetaDataProvider. Supports a feature for retrieving generated keys without the JDBC 3.0 getGeneratedKeys support.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.5
    作者:
    Thomas Risberg

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.springframework.jdbc.core.metadata.GenericTableMetaDataProvider

        logger

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getSimpleQueryForGetGeneratedKey(java.lang.String tableName, java.lang.String keyColumnName)
      Get the simple query to retrieve a generated key.
      boolean isGetGeneratedKeysSimulated()
      Does this database support a simple query to retrieve the generated key when the JDBC 3.0 feature of retrieving generated keys is not supported?

      • isGetGeneratedKeysSimulated

        public boolean isGetGeneratedKeysSimulated()
        从接口复制的说明: TableMetaDataProvider
        Does this database support a simple query to retrieve the generated key when the JDBC 3.0 feature of retrieving generated keys is not supported?
        指定者:
        isGetGeneratedKeysSimulated 在接口中 TableMetaDataProvider
        覆盖:
        isGetGeneratedKeysSimulated 在类中 GenericTableMetaDataProvider
        另请参阅:
        TableMetaDataProvider.isGetGeneratedKeysSupported()
